name: Superkickoff
description:
Superkickoff is an application to simulate soccer tournaments. We put a face to the players and add real situations so that you can live a unique experience of current football in a mobile application.

* Play with your favorite team
* Manage your squad
* Make the best signings
* Surprise your opponent with your superior tactics
* Acquire legendary players
* Use various items for your game
* Analyze data, see statistics, query rankins
* Acquire and select the leagues for your game
* Expand your stadium
* Take your team to glory
